summary: So you've found all 5 Paragons in the Forgotten Vale? Well, now you have a sixth, even richer chest to open, which requires all five. This little mod is the second in my Completionist series, meant to reward a completionist collector. REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.
descriptionHtml:
[b]AL'S PARAGON REWARD CHEST - [i]Requires Dawnguard DLC[/i][/b]

This little mod is the second in my Completionist series, meant to reward the serious completionist collector. In this case, the player who successfully collects all five Paragons from the Frost Giants in the Forgotten Vale. This mod is only a very little mod, but it does what I intended it to do.

[b]WHAT THIS MOD DOES[/b]

It adds a chest full of very rich loot to the Temple Balcony (where you confront Vyrthur), and a half-fallen altar to Auriel beside it. The chest is locked and cannot be opened by pick or key. However, if you activate the altar while carrying all 5 paragons, the chest will unlock. (In addition, the altar will grant you the normal blessing, whether you have the paragons or not.)

In this way, there is some small reward for the achievement of discovering all the paragons.

[b]What This Mod Does NOT Do[/b]

It does not add a 6th portal location.

It does not add a 6th paragon.

It does not include any enemies.

-----

[b]Take a look at the other mods in my Completionist Series![/b]

[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

Al's Completionist Series:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9994]Al's TREASURE VAULT[/url] -- [i]Now you have a place to store all your gold and have it display as treasure![/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30633]Als Paragon Reward Chest[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 5 Paragons[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30643]Als Konahrik[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all vanilla dragon priest masks with a previously missing boss fight[/i]
4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30765]Als Treasure Map Reward[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 11 Treasure Maps in vanilla Skyrim[/i]
5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url] -- [i]modestly sized dungeon rewarding the completionist player who collects all Dragon Claws in vanilla Skyrim with fantastic amounts of treasure[/i]
